name: Merry Chicken
description:
PLEASE OPEN FULLSCREEN!!!!!

A and D to move left and right , Space key to jump. The jump will have some animation delay.

A puzzle game where you need to use your time rewinding power to solve


The programmer never make 2D game in Unity, the Artist are new to game development! We learnt so much in the developing process!! 
Game Developing is so much fun! :D
